description: The VAR_PHENOTYPE_DESC table contains the phenotype description for the variant.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PHENOTYPE_DESC
columns.description: Stores the possible associated phenotypes for this variant.
